net.proteusframework.core.mail

Class EmailAddressValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.mail.EmailAddressValidator

  • public class EmailAddressValidator
extends Object
    Validates an email address. This class will do rfc822 validation. Optionally it will also do dns MX record validation and SMTP verification / validation.

    SMTP validation can take a long time to complete. The time will vary depending on the mail server. Some mail servers take a long time to return a 550 response, possibly due to spammers. For example, during testing it would take up to 30-60 seconds to verify a gmail.com address.

    This class is not thread safe.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

        true or false.

      • isSmtpValidation

        public boolean isSmtpValidation()
        Returns true if SMTP validation should be used in validate(String). SMTP validation implies DNS validation. This does not apply to validate2(String, Set).
        Returns:
        true or false.
